original_text: excellent art style , thrilling gameplay and dynamic storyline/setting. absolutely loving playing each legendary figure and trying different strategies each time.

loved the game. one of the best total wars and am very happy they are going this route. also for the loved of the strategy god were is the blood dlc? if you are going to sell it okey but at least give us the blood dlc on day one .... .

sun jian chase after my small troops form lujiang to boyang. ambush him in the midway and capture him then chop his head off. am so satisfied when my trick is working. am so satisfied by playing this game. best three kindoms game ever. hope you guys also enjoy it.
one of the best total war games , nice art and environments , great fights , interesting heroes , good diplomatic options
the game is great ... but it needs few more balancing like the corruption system and special unit cost and upkeep ... furthermore please fix the ai cheating! !!

normally cannot be bother to write reviews , but this game is amazing , have played all the other total war games , and love them , but later in the game has not been challenging and is usually boring , not kingdoms. this game is brilliant from start to finish.
great optimization , diplomacy and character building. definitely big step up from creative assembly.

it deserves the praise. very polished , fun and addicting game that combines massive real time battles with turn based strategy on the campaign map. diplomacy is great , the characters are interesting and the game runs like dream , which is not always the case with total war games on release.
play 15h straight. if play game hours on end is good in my book =)
